title: Solar PV capacity - new installations worldwide by country 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of newly installed capacity in the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity of Country Netherlands is 45.0% smaller than the maximum value at China.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of newly installed capacity in each Country on the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of newly installed capacity in the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity of Country Netherlands is 45.0% smaller than the maximum value at China.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of newly installed capacity in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of newly installed capacity 45.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Netherlands where Country is 1.0.
Second maximum Percentage of newly installed capacity is found at Country US.
There is a difference of 44.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Netherlands.
Percentage of newly installed capacity at Country China is 45.0 , second place is US at 11.0, and thirdly is US at 11.0.
Country India, and US have a similar Percentage of newly installed capacity that is 11.0.
The Country Netherlands tends to be 5.06 percent lower than average.
